text: Would be nice if we could *search* in the *file-manager* the *file-id*.

In addition to download what about upload a module .zip for a non developer. So we can say this "go here and upload .zip and everything should be fixed." Instead you have to ask for user account permissions with your email to cli upload for them.

I know you guys are working on custom breakpoints, but could you please just add a 2nd one that we can utilize besides mobile, at least in the interim? Call it “tablet”, and then have a desktop, tablet, and mobile icon button in the page editor.
